video_prompt: Futuristic multi-story building facade's monitors change their vivid data displays. Bustling street below, a white car slowly moves, while light blue and pink trains glide through foreground and mid-ground. Subtle shifts in building lights suggest internal activity. Sidewalks show people moving. Signs subtly animate.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** High-angle view of a futuristic cyberpunk city street, daytime. Central multi-story building, light colored, with two large, vertically stacked CRT-like monitors displaying green/red data and cyan schematics. Pink and red accents on its facade. Dense, desaturated blue/grey surrounding buildings, some with AC units. Bustling street with yellow lines, white car, and light blue/pink and orange/grey trains/trams. Vibrantly detailed, organized chaos, with people and signage, soft even lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Vivid data displays animate and shift across prominent screens. A white car slowly moves below. Light blue and pink trains glide through the scene. Interior lights subtly shift. People move on foot. Signs subtly animate.
